days.name: Day 1
days.description: Welcome day with preliminary lectures and initial stream specific discussions. The day will close with a presentation of the stream goals.

days.name: Day 2
days.description: Latest news on iCSD program and how last summits achievements have been used. A presentation of Enterprise iPaas digital platform and the PoV regarding digital business will be presented by a guest from CC. The majority of time will be used for work in stream sessions.

days.name: Day 3
days.description: A short morning welcome with an anouncement will lead us to the final stream-sessions. Afterwards each stream gets some time to present its results and outlook to the audience. Feedback and goodbye.

streams.name: Web Innovation
streams.description: The web develops faster than ever. Web browsers are becoming great platforms full of new APIs which bring brand new opportunities to offer to our customers. Imagine an application runs in a web browser and is capable of working offline and synchronizing its state once online. Imagine the application behaves on your mobile as if it were a native app: you can add it to your home screen and you get push notifications. Imagine you can build reusable, browser native UI components you can share across your organization or even across the whole web world. And this is just the beginning.

streams.name: IT orchestration for hybrid clouds
streams.description: IT orchestration with hybrid cloud solutions will be the focus of our business, combined with IPaaS, Capgemini’s future platform to develop, execute and manage integration, our Cloud Choice offering for E2E solutions (Advise, Align Animate) and our tools for SW-Automation with DevOps, Microservices and automated provisioning.

streams.name: Engineering and digital security
streams.description: Prevent – Protect - Detect – Monitor. How to identify threats and find the right measures to improve security. Cybersecurity is a necessary ingredients of the digitalization. Only the trustable service will be successful. We want to define aspects in architecture and methods, where we can make a difference in security and generate a vision for our future security model.

streams.name: Let‘s Become an Architects‘ Company
streams.description: Let‘s Become an Architects‘ Company! Digital transformation, Agile & DevOps, Rightshoring and Industrialization – what shapes the architects’ way they work and the architects’ company of tomorrow? Career model, certifications, trainings, roles in ACCESS – the journey already started … We create the vision for Capgemini as a company of architecture excellence!

streams.name: Industrial IoT
streams.description: IoT revolutionizes the way enterprises operate their business. Smart machines requesting maintenance the best point in time, buildings optimizing conditions like climate, temperature and other themselves, cars reserving parking places are but a few examples. We consider new IT concepts and architectures to enable powerful IoT platforms like digital twins, different types of connectivity, event processing and machine learning. We discuss the challenges in architecting and developing IoT solutions with regard to build, deploy and test.
